titles.title: My God My God And Can It Be (unique jumps arou

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My God - My God And can it be That I should sin So lightly now And think no more Of evil thoughts Than of the wind That waves the bough{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I sin and heav'n And earth go round As if no dreadful Deed were done As if Thy blood Had never flowed To hinder sin Or to atone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shall it be always Thus O Lord Wilt Thou not work This hour in me The grace Thy passion merited Hatred of self And love of Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh by the pains Of Thy pure love Grant me the gift Of holy fear And by Thy woes And bloody sweat Oh wash my guilty Conscience clear{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ever when tempted Make me see Beneath the olives' Moon-pierced shade My God alone Outstretched and bruised And bleeding on The earth He made{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And make me feel It was my sin As though no other Sins there were That was to Him Who bears the world A load that He Could scarcely bear{/lang-eng}
